All stickers, glue and writing removed from glass – Trade Clean

- (Item number)
Glass free from defects as per standards AS/NZS4667:2000
All stickers, glue and writing removed from glass. Trade clean
Installation matches council consented drawings, specification and PS1.
Lagscrews and or bolts have minimum penetration achieved as per PS1 and are at the correct spacings.
Threaded rods anchored in concrete have minimum required embedment as per PS1 along with dust removed from holes prior to using the specified chemset. And are at the required spacings.
Fixings to steel are the correct size as per the PS1 and at the required spacings.
EPDM washers have been used between different materials.
There is no direct contact between metal and glass.
Interlinking panel clamps are fitted and at the same height.
Handrail brackets are securely fitted to the glass and handrail fixed back to the building structure.
Interlinking rail is correctly fitted and adhered to the glass and fixed back to the building structure.
All cover plates are correctly fitted and secure.
Glass in semi frameless posts have the correct amount of edge cover as per the PS1.
Semi frameless post are installed at the required spacings and correct fixings used as per the PS1.
Glass panes meet the minimum requirement for both width and height.
Compliance (Toughened, sizing and specification/film inside)
